name: Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate
description:
Across the city, people are being mysteriously kidnapped and they are never seen again. Eve, the protagonist, was just looking for a job and somehow ended up discovering a strange world where she awakens her powers and learn the truth behind the kidnappings...

  • Action combat;
  •  Linear story-driven;
  • Fight giant monsters;
  • Explore strange worlds.

Minimun System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or better
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 800 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better

Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate.

Game developed in RPG Maker MV.

For feedback, bug report or support, contact: calmedbythedarkfeedback@gmail.com

 Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate is already included in Calmed by the Dark Leviathan. This is a stand-alone package.
